text:
related to bug 4646, dos to unix conversions for text files fail if the text 
file happens to be in unix format already.  (if opened in notepad it appears as 
a very long line).
creator: colin.wong@redknee.com

text:
A fix has been put in for bug 4646.
Can you grab a nightly build, and see if that has also fixed your problem?
I suspect it will.
creator: tim@adjective.org
colin.wong@redknee.com
text:
Seems to be okay in 1.5a (nightly build 2001-11-14)

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 4646 ***
